greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest 4th power divisible by n.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: f[p_, e_] := p^(e + Mod[4 - Mod[e, 4], 4]); a[n_] := Times @@ (f @@@ FactorInteger[n]); Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Aug 29 2019*)
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 29 2000
